sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app dark>


       <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click.stop="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>


    <v-navigation-drawer
      v-model="drawer"
      absolute
      bottom
      temporary
    >
      <v-list
        nav
        dense
      >
        <v-list-item-group
          v-model="group"
          active-class="deep-purple--text text--accent-4"
        >
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title><router-link to='/OTsubmmit'>加班申請</router-link></v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title>休假申請</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title>打卡紀錄</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title>補休累計時數</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title>職務代理人設定</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list-item-group>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
    <router-view>
    </router-view>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    HelloWorld,
  },
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
    group: null,
  }),
  watch: {
      group () {
        this.drawer = false
      },
    },
};
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: 'Microsoft JhengHei', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
</style>
